title: Every Day Needs A Dog
description: When Elizabeth Fischer unexpectedly loses her job as the head of public relations at a large pharmaceutical company, sheâ€™s left with big bills and few options. She reluctantly accepts a job as the president of an animal shelter in Spring Valley, a small town twenty miles outside of the city. Elizabeth is a big-city girl, who has never even owned a pet. What does she know about running an animal shelter? She has no idea how much her life is about to change."Every Day Needs A Dog" is the third book in the Spring Valley Romance Collection.
author: Billi Tiner
